name: Jason Chan
home:
Hello and a warm welcome to my portfolio website!

My name is Jason, and I'm excited to have you here. As you navigate through these digital pages, you'll discover a diverse range of projects that reflect my passion, skills, and dedication.

Every project tells a unique story of overcoming challenges, bringing ideas to life, and solutions crafted with care. With every line of code, every pixel meticulously placed, I strive to create experiences that leave a lasting impression.

Whether you're an industry professional, a fellow enthusiast, or simply curious about what I can bring to the table, I invite you to delve into my collection of completed projects. Each one is a testament to my expertise, creativity, and attention to detail.

I believe in the power of collaboration, so if you have any questions, ideas, or potential collaborations, feel free to reach out. Together, we can bring new visions to life.

Thank you for joining me on this journey. I hope you find inspiration, joy, and a glimpse into the possibilities that await. Welcome to my portfolio, where imagination meets reality!

timeline.title: Northcoders - Junior Full Stack Developer
timeline.description: 13-Week Software Development Bootcamp Course covering the essentials of Back End and Front End through the use of JavaScript, HTML, CSS, and SQL.

timeline.title: Arcadis - Assistant Civil Engineer
timeline.description: Developed, designed and delivered key bridges for HS2, which are currently under construction.

timeline.title: Friars School
